SA20n1377:2: lajjā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena |
SA20n1377:4: etena svabhāvasahāyālambanakarmasaṃpadā caturvidhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ bodhisattvalajjāyāḥ saṃdarśitaṃ |
SA20n1377:21: hīnāśayā samānā hīnā hi tadanyathā tvadhikā ||3 ||
SA20n1377:24: ataḥ paraṃ caturbhistribhiśca ślokairyathākramaṃ lajjāvipakṣe lajjāyāṃ ca doṣaguṇabhedaṃ darśayati |
SA20n1377:27: ityatra ātmavyābādhāya cetayate paravyābādhāyobhayavyābādhāya ceti saṃdarśitam |
SA20n1377:46: ityanena tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayata iti saṃdarśitam |
SA20n1377:47: ete sarve doṣā hīmatsu bhavanti no jinasuteṣu |
SA20n1377:50: deveṣu ca manujeṣu ca nityaṃ saṃjāyate ca budhaḥ ||8 ||
SA20n1377:52: saṃbhārāṃśca sa bodheḥ kṣipraṃ pūrayati lajjayā dhīmān |
SA20n1377:54: sattvānāṃ pācanayā na khidyate caiva jinaputraḥ ||9 ||
SA20n1377:60: iti yathoktadoṣābhāvaṃ guṇayogaṃ ca prāpnotīti saṃdarśitam |
SA20n1377:66: ākāśamiva na lipto hrīyukto jinasuto bhavati dharmaiḥ |
SA20n1377:80: etena caturvidhaṃ hrīkṛtaṃ liṅgaṃ hīmato darśayati |
SA20n1377:89: vīryaṃ samādhiḥ prajñā ca sattvaṃ dhairyaṃ dhṛtirmatā |
SA20n1377:97: sarvakāryeṣu hi līnacittatayā vā bhayamutpadyate tadanutsāhataḥ |
SA20n1377:102: prakṛtyā praṇidhāne ca nirapekṣatva eva ca |
SA20n1377:107: asamā ca tadanyebhyaḥ so 'gre dhṛtimatāṃ yataḥ[mataḥ] ||21 ||
SA20n1377:130: ābhyāṃ vastuto niśrayataḥ svabhāvataḥ prabhedataścākhedo nirdiṣṭaḥ |
SA20n1377:136: tābhyāṃ hi khedotpattito lajjayate na cotpādayati |
SA20n1377:148: adhyātmavidyā hetuvidyā śabdavidyā cikitsāvidyā śilpakarmasthānavidyā ca |
SA20n1377:150: karma prathamavastuni svayaṃ pratipattiḥ parebhyaśca tatsamākhyānaṃ |
SA20n1377:155: lakṣaṇaṃ śāstrajñatāyā etānyeva pañca vastūni śrutāni bhavanti |
SA20n1377:165: sā punareṣā śāsrajñatā bodhisattvānāṃ samādhimukhairdhāraṇīmukhaiśca saṃgṛhītā |
SA20n1377:183: dvābhyāṃ satyābhyāṃ lokasyodayaḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāro yaścodayo yena ceti kṛtvā |
SA20n1377:188: śamāya prāptaye teṣāṃ dhīmān satyeṣu yujyate |
SA20n1377:196: tatra prāmāṇiko 'rtho yaḥ pramāṇabhūtena nīto vibhaktaḥ śāstrā vā tatpramāṇīkṛtena vā |
SA20n1377:202: prathame pratisaraṇe ārṣadharmapratikṣeptuḥ pudnalasya pratiṣedho deśitaḥ |
SA20n1377:215: paryāye lakṣaṇe vākye jñāne jñānācca tā matāḥ ||34 ||
SA20n1377:218: tṛtīyā vākye pratyekaṃ janapadeṣu yā bhāṣāḥ |
SA20n1377:221: deśanāyāṃ prayuktasya yasya yena ca deśanā |
SA20n1377:226: deśanāyāṃ hi prayuktasya yasya ca deśanā yena ca |
SA20n1377:233: vākyena deśanā tayoreva dvayoḥ sarvathā prāpaṇāt |
SA20n1377:235: ato yacca yena ca deśyate tajjñānāt catasraḥ pratisaṃvido vyavasthāpitāḥ |
SA20n1377:238: etena pratisaṃvidāṃ nirvacanaṃ karma ca darśitaṃ |
SA20n1377:239: pratyātmaṃ lokottareṇa jñānena sarvadharmasamatāṃ tathatāmavetya uttarakālaṃ tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena jñānena pravedanā paryāyādīnāṃ pratisaṃviditi nirvacanaṃ |
SA20n1377:248: dānaṃ śīlaṃ ca puṇyasya prajñā jñānasya saṃbhṛtiḥ |
SA20n1377:253: punaḥ prajñāyāṃ pariṇāmanātsarvāḥ pañca pāramitā jñānasaṃbhāro veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1377:254: saṃtatyā bhāvanāmetya bhūyo bhūyaḥ śubhasya hi |
SA20n1377:255: āhāro yaḥ sa saṃbhāro vī[dhī]re sarvārthasādhakaḥ ||40 ||
SA20n1377:287: kathaṃ prāptitaḥ kāyādīnāṃ na visaṃyogāya nāvisaṃyogāya |
SA20n1377:298: kathaṃ bhāvanātaḥ atyantaṃ tadbhāvanāt nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇe 'pi tadakṣayāt |
SA20n1377:304: yāvatyaḥ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanā uktāḥ tadvipakṣāṇāṃ doṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa samyakprahāṇabhāvaneti samastaṃ samyakprahāṇalakṣaṇam |
SA20n1377:307: manaskārasya ca tyāge praveśe caiva bhūmiṣu ||46 ||
SA20n1377:309: sattvānāṃ paripāke ca abhiṣeke ca dhīmatāṃ ||47 ||
SA20n1377:310: kṣetrasya ca viśuddhyarthaṃ niṣṭhāgamana eva ca |
SA20n1377:324: ye ca vipakṣāsteṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa samyakprahāṇabhāvanā veditavyā |
SA20n1377:333: chandaṃ hi niśritya śamathavipaśyanākhyaṃ yogaṃ bhāvayatīti vyāyacchate |
SA20n1377:334: sā ca bhāvanā śamathapragrahopekṣānimittaiḥ saha bhāvyate |
SA20n1377:344: eṣā yogabhāvanā yathoktaprabhedeṣu sarvasamyakprahāṇeṣu pratipakṣa ucyate |
SA20n1377:361: aṣṭānāṃ prahāṇasaṃskārāṇāṃ chando vyāyāmaḥ śraddhā vyāvasāyikaḥ upāyaḥ |
SA20n1377:372: tatra darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ pañcavidhaṃ māṃsacakṣuḥ dīvyaṃ cakṣuḥ āryaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ dharmacakṣuḥ buddhacakṣuśca |
SA20n1377:374: tābhirupasaṃkramya bhāṣāṃ cittaṃ cāgatiṃ ca gatiṃ ca viditvā niḥsaraṇāyāvavadanāt |
SA20n1377:375: sthitivikriḍitaṃ yasmāt bodhisattvānāṃ bahuvidhaṃ nirmāṇādibhiḥ samādhivikrīḍitaṃ |
SA20n1377:376: praṇidhiryena praṇidhijñānena praṇidhānabalikā bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhānavaiśeṣikatayā vikrīḍanti |
SA20n1377:377: yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya vā prabhāyā vā svarasya veti vistareṇa yathā daśabhūmike sūtre |
SA20n1377:378: vaśitā yathā tatraiva daśa vaśitā nirdiṣṭāḥ |
SA20n1377:397: etena yasyāmavasthāyāṃ yasyāvabodhāt bodhyaṅgāni vyavasthāpyante tadupadiṣṭaṃ |
SA20n1377:398: bhūmipraviṣṭāvasthāyāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca samatāvabodhādyathākramaṃ dharmanairātmyenātmaparasamatayā ca |
SA20n1377:410: tataḥ prītiḥ sarvaṃ kāryaṃ[yaṃ] sadā prīṇayati |
SA20n1377:419: upekṣocyate nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ tayā bodhisattvaḥ sarvatra yathākāmaṃ viharati |
SA20n1377:425: tatra ca gatvā vāsaṃ kalpayati yatrākhinnaḥ caturaṅgo bālakāyaḥ paraiti |
SA20n1377:437: yena yanniśritya yo 'saṃkleśa iti trividhamasaṃkleśāṅgaṃ veditavyam |
SA20n1377:445: tadvyavasthāne ca sūtrādike bhagavatā kṛte sa eva praveśastena tadarthāvabodhāt |
SA20n1377:448: pratipakṣasya bhāvanā samyagvyāyāmādayo yathākramaṃ jñeyāvaraṇasya mārgāvaraṇasya ca vaiśeṣikaguṇāvaraṇasya ca samyagvyāyāmena dīrghaṃ hi kālam akhidyamāno jñeyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati |
SA20n1377:450: samyaksamādhinā vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhārāyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayatyevamaṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyante |
SA20n1377:455: dharmāṇāṃ ca pravicayādyathākramaṃ śamatho vipaśyanā ca veditavyā |
SA20n1377:458: sā ca śamathavipaśyanā sarvatragā yaṃ yaṃ guṇamākāṅkṣati tatra tatra tadbhāvanāt |
SA20n1377:460: ākāṅkṣedbhikṣuraho vatāhaṃ viviktaṃ kāmairiti vistareṇa yāvat tena bhikṣuṇā imāveva dvau dharmau bhāvayitavyau |
SA20n1377:469: ityupaniṣanmatetyevamādinā śamathavipaśyanāyāḥ prabhedaḥ karma ca nirdiṣṭaṃ |
SA20n1377:477: tadeva ca bhūmitrayaṃ niśritya buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayitavyaṃ |
SA20n1377:488: kṣiprābhisaṃbodhe sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yāvad bhavatu me jñānaṃ saṃbodhāyeti pratideśanā 'numodanādhyeṣaṇā pariṇāmanā |
SA20n1377:492: asmin pañcavidha upāye sarvabhūmiṣu bodhisattvānāmasamaṃ tadanyaiḥ kauśalamityayaṃ prabhedaḥ |
SA20n1377:496: parīttā mahatī sā ca mahatī trividhā punaḥ ||71 ||
SA20n1377:501: atrāpi prabhedaḥ karma ca dhāraṇyāḥ saṃdarśitaṃ |
SA20n1377:510: abhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ mṛdvī bhūmipraviṣṭānām aśuddhabhūmikānāṃ madhyā saptasu bhūmiṣu |
SA20n1377:511: pariśuddhabhūmikā tvadhimātrā śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu ityayaṃ prabhedo dhāraṇyāḥ |
SA20n1377:514: cetanā chandasahitā jñānena preritā ca tat |
SA20n1377:516: hetubhūtaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ cittātsadyaḥ phalaṃ ca tat |
SA20n1377:520: atra praṇidhānaṃ svabhāvato nidānato bhūmitaḥ prabhedataḥ karmataśca paridīpitaṃ |
SA20n1377:524: tacca praṇidhānaṃ hetubhūtaṃ cittādeva sadyaḥ phalatvāt |
SA20n1377:525: āyatyāṃ vā[cā]bhipretārthasiddhyarthaṃ cittātpunaḥ sadyaḥphalaṃ cittamātrāt yathābhipretārthasamṛddhitā[to] |
SA20n1377:528: yasya na sukarā saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya veti vistaraḥ |
SA20n1377:541: trividhaśca grāhyasya gocarasya grāhakā ye samādhayaḥ |
SA20n1377:542: te śūnyatādisamādhayaḥ iti grāhyagrāhakabhāvena trayaḥ samādhayo jñātavyāḥ |
SA20n1377:557: tatra sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhāḥ ityapraṇihitasya samādherūpaniṣadbhāvena deśitaṃ |
SA20n1377:567: evaśabdenāvadhāraṇaṃ parikalpita ātmā nāsti parikalpamātraṃ tvastīti parikalpitalakṣaṇasyābhāvārtho 'nātmārtha ityuktaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1377:575: tatra kṣaṇikaṃ sarvaṃ saṃskṛtamiti paścādvacanadiyaṃ pratijñā veditavyā |
SA20n1377:580: atha kālāntaraṃ sthitvā pūrvottaranirodhotpādataḥ prabandheneṣyate vṛttiḥ |
SA20n1377:582: naiva cotpannasya vinā prabandhena kālāntaraṃ bhāvo yujyate |
SA20n1377:585: tadyadi bhūtvā punaruttarakālaṃ bhavati tasyāvaśyaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ |
SA20n1377:587: na ca tattenaiva hetunā bhavitumarhati tasyopayu[bhu]ktahetukatvāt |
SA20n1377:590: evaṃ vinā prabandhenotpannasya kālāntaraṃ bhāvo na yujyate |
SA20n1377:591: athāpyevamiṣyeta notpannaṃ punarutpadyate yadarthaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ syādutpannaṃ tu kālāntareṇa paścānnirudhyate notpannamātrameveti |
SA20n1377:602: māyopamāste bhikṣo saṃskārā āpāyikāstāvatkālikā itvarapratyupasthāyina iti |
SA20n1377:604: te hi saṃskārāṇāmudayavyayau manasikurvantaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyanti |
SA20n1377:605: anyathā hi teṣāmapi nirvidvirāgavimuktayo na syuryathānyeṣāṃ maraṇakālādiṣu nirodhaṃ paśyatāṃ |
SA20n1377:606: yadi cotpannaḥ saṃskāraḥ kālāntaraṃ tiṣṭhet sa svayameva vā tiṣṭhetsvayameva sthātuṃ samarthaḥ |
SA20n1377:611: kena vā so 'nte punaḥ sthātuṃ na samarthaḥ |
SA20n1377:615: labdhe tu vināśakāraṇe paścādvinaśyati agnimeva śyāmateti |
SA20n1377:621: tathā hi tatsaṃbandhāt śyāmatāyāḥ saṃtatirvisadṛśī gṛhyate na tu sarvathaivāpravṛttiḥ |
SA20n1377:629: athāpi syātpratikṣaṇamapūrvotpattau tadevedamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ na syāditi |
SA20n1377:637: tadyadi nādita evārabdhaṃ bhavedādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānāmante pariṇāmo nopalabhyeta |
SA20n1377:638: tasmādādita evānyathātvamārabdhaṃ yatkrameṇābhivardhamānamante vyaktimāpadyate kṣīrasyeva dadyavasthāyāṃ |
SA20n1377:647: kṣaṇikaṃ hi cittaṃ prasiddhaṃ tasya cānye saṃskārāścakṣurūpādayo hetutaḥ |
SA20n1377:649: na tvakṣaṇikāt kṣaṇikaṃ bhavitumarhati yathā nityādanityamiti |
SA20n1377:653: cittena hi sarve saṃskārāścakṣurādayaḥ sādhiṣṭhānā upāttāḥ sahasaṃmurchanāḥ tadanugrahānuvṛttitaḥ |
SA20n1377:657: cittenāyaṃ loko nīyate cittena parikṛṣyate cittasyotpannasyotpannasya vaśe vartate iti |
SA20n1377:661: śuddhaṃ hi yogināṃ cittaṃ saṃskārā anuvartante |
SA20n1377:663: dhyāyī bhikṣuḥ ṛddhimāṃścittavaśe prāpta imaṃ dāruskandhaṃ sacet suvarṇamadhimucyate tadapyasya tathaiva syāditi |
SA20n1377:666: tathā hi pāpakāriṣu sattveṣu bāhyā bhāvā hīnā bhavanti |
SA20n1377:670: na hi kṣaṇikasyākṣaṇikaṃ phalaṃ yujyate tadanuvidhāyitvāt |
SA20n1377:671: evaṃ tāvadaviśeṣeṇa saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ sādhitam |
SA20n1377:672: ādhyātmikānāṃ punaḥ sādhanārthaṃ pañca ślokā veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1377:694: bhāsvaratvena yo nirmitakāmeṣu paranirmitakāmeṣu rūpārūpyeṣu copapannānāṃ cittamātrādhīnatvāt |
SA20n1377:699: pratibimbatvena yo aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyināṃ samādhivaśena pratibimbānāṃ[khyānāṃ] saṃskārāṇāmutpādaḥ |
SA20n1377:700: etasyāṃ caturdaśavidhāyāmutpattāvādhyātmikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ hetumānaviśeṣādibhiḥ kāraṇairveditavyam |
SA20n1377:702: yadi hi tasya hetutvena viśeṣo na syāt taduttarāyāḥ saṃskārapravṛtteruttarottaraviśeṣo nopalabhyeta hetvaviśeṣāt |
SA20n1377:706: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā 'nyatvena parimāṇaviśeṣo bhavet |
SA20n1377:711: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā puṣṭatarotpattyā yujyetopacayaḥ |
SA20n1377:713: na hi tiṣṭhatyāśraye ca tadāśritasyānavasthānaṃ yujyate |
SA20n1377:714: yāne tiṣṭhati tadārūḍhānavasthānavadanyathā hyāśrayatvaṃ na saṃbhavet |
SA20n1377:718: na cāvasthāntareṣu paripāka ādāvavināśe satyante vikārābhāvāt |
SA20n1377:719: tathā hīnaviśiṣṭotpattau kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā vikāraparipākotpattau |
SA20n1377:720: na hi tathāsthiteṣveva saṃskāreṣu karmavāsanā vṛttiṃ labhate yato durgatau vā syādutpattiḥ sugatau vā |
SA20n1377:726: na hi saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃkrāntilakṣaṇā gatirnāma kācit kriyā yujyate |
SA20n1377:727: sā hyutpannā vā saṃskāraṃ deśāntaraṃ gamayedanutpannā vā |
SA20n1377:728: yadyutpannā tena gatikāle na kaṃcidgata iti sthitasyaiva gamanaṃ nopapadyate |
SA20n1377:729: athānutpannā tenāsatyāṃ gatau gata iti na yujyate |
SA20n1377:730: sā ca kriyā yadi taddeśastha eva saṃskāre kāritraṃ karoti na yujyate |
SA20n1377:734: na ca kriyā tatra vā anyatra vā deśe sthitā saṃskārādanyopalabhyate |
SA20n1377:743: asti svabhāvavaśena yathā vāyostiryaggamanamagnerūrdhvaṃ jvalanamapāṃ nimne syandanaṃ |
SA20n1377:748: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ hetubhāvamantareṇa tathāsthitasyānyasminkāle punarbījabhāvo yujyate |
SA20n1377:750: na ca śakyaṃ pūrvaṃ sabījatvaṃ carame kṣaṇe nirbījatvamabhyupagantuṃ |
SA20n1377:767: ato bhūtānāṃ ṣaḍivadhārthasya ca kṣaṇikatvaṃ vidhīyate |
SA20n1377:777: adbhyo hi vāyusahitābhyaḥ pṛthivī saṃbhūtā vivartakāle |
SA20n1377:784: sa cāntareṇa pratikṣaṇamanyotpattiṃ na yujyate vināśakāraṇābhāvāt |
SA20n1377:787: na hi tejasyutpanne tejaḥ sahotpannamindhanaṃ tathaivāvatiṣṭhate |
SA20n1377:788: na ca dagdhendhanaṃ tejaḥ sthātuṃ samarthaṃ |
SA20n1377:791: śabdaḥ punaryo 'pi kālāntaramupalabhyate ghaṇṭādīnāṃ tasyāpi kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ tāratamyopalabdheḥ |
SA20n1377:793: dharmāyatanikasyāpi rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasiddhameva cittānuvṛtteryathā pūrvamuktaṃ |
SA20n1377:795: pṛcchrayate khalvapi sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ sidhyati kathaṃ kṛtvā |
SA20n1377:799: yadyevaṃ vadet pratikṣaṇamanya[nitya]tvasyāgrahaṇāditi sa idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ |
SA20n1377:806: dvividhaṃ hi vailakṣaṇyaṃ svabhāvavailakṣaṇyaṃ vṛttivailakṣaṇyaṃ ca |
SA20n1377:807: tadyadi tāvat svabhāvavailakṣaṇyamabhipretamata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ yujyate |
SA20n1377:808: na hi tatsvabhāva eva tasya dṛṣṭānto bhavati yathā pradīpaḥ pradīpasya gaurvā goriti |
SA20n1377:809: atha vṛttivailakṣaṇyamata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ pradīpādīnāṃ prasiddhatvāt |
SA20n1377:814: cakṣurādiṣu tiṣṭhatsu tadāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ prabandhena gacchatīti na yujyate |
SA20n1377:815: yadyevaṃ vadet nanu ca dṛṣṭaṃ vartisaṃniśrite pradīpe prabandhena gacchati vartyā avasthānamiti |
SA20n1377:817: na dṛṣṭaṃ tatprabandhena vartyāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ vikārotpatteriti |
SA20n1377:818: yadyevaṃ vadet sati kṣaṇikattve saṃskārāṇāṃ kasmātpradīpādiva kṣaṇiakatvaṃ na siddhamiti |
SA20n1377:822: itarathā hi anityanityaviparyāso na syāttadabhāve saṃkleśo na syāt kutaḥ punarvyavadānamityevaṃ paryanuyogato 'pi kṣaṇikatvaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prasiddhaṃ |
SA20n1377:824: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu |
SA20n1377:832: dvaye sati ca vijñānasaṃbhavātpratyayo na saḥ |
SA20n1377:843: ātmopalambhe doṣaśca deśito yata eva ca ||101 ||
SA20n1377:847: ayatnamokṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ na mokṣaḥ pudgalo'sti vā ||103 ||
SA20n1377:849: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu |
SA20n1377:850: yataśca prajñaptito 'stīti vaktavyo dravyato nāstīti vaktavyaḥ |
SA20n1377:854: na hi sa dravyata upalabhyate rūpādivat |
SA20n1377:856: na ca pudgalaṃ buddhyā na pratipadyante pudgalavādinaḥ |
SA20n1377:858: dṛṣṭa eva dharme ātmānamupalabhate prajñāpayatīti kathaṃ nopalabdho bhavati |
SA20n1377:859: na sa evamupalabhyamāno dravyata upalabdho bhavati |
SA20n1377:861: viparyāsāt tathā hyanātmanyātmeti viparyāsa ukto bhagavatā |
SA20n1377:865: satkāyadṛṣṭikleśalakṣaṇo hyeṣa saṃkleśo yaduta ahaṃ mameti |
SA20n1377:867: na[sa] caiṣa saṃkleśa iti kathaṃ veditavyaṃ |
SA20n1377:870: yatra punarvastuni rūpādisaṃjñakeprajñaptiḥ pudgala iti tasmātkimekatvena pudgalo vaktavya āhosvidanyetvena | āha |
SA20n1377:876: ekatve hi skandhānāmātmatvaṃ prasajyate pudgalasya ca dravyasattvaṃ |
SA20n1377:880: ye punaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanamatikramya pudgalasya dravyato 'stitvamicchanti ta idaṃ syurvacanīyāḥ |
SA20n1377:889: ekatvenānyatvena ca agnirhi nāma tejodhāturindhanaṃ śeṣāṇi bhūtāni |
SA20n1377:891: loke ca vināpyagninā dṛṣṭamindhanaṃ kāṣṭhādi vināpi cendhanenāgniriti siddhamanyatvaṃ |
SA20n1377:894: upalabdhestathā hi vāyunā vikṣiptaṃ dūramapi jvalatparaiti |
SA20n1377:899: astyeva pudgalo ya eṣa draṣṭā yāvadvijñātā kartā bhoktā jñātā moktā ca |
SA20n1377:902: sa hi darśānādisaṃjñakānāṃ vijñānānāṃ pratyayabhāvena vā kartā bhavet svāmitvena vā |
SA20n1377:907: na hi tasya tatra kiṃcitsāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ |
SA20n1377:909: sa hi vijñānapravṛttau svāmībhavannani[bhavanni]ṣṭaṃ vijñānamanityaṃ na pravartayet |
SA20n1377:930: api khalu pudgalo draṣṭā bhavan yāvadvijñātā darśanādiṣu saprayatno vā bhavenniṣprayatno vā |
SA20n1377:931: saprayatnasya vā punarasau prayatnaḥ svayaṃbhūrvā bhavedākasmikaḥ |
SA20n1377:937: niṣprayatnasya vā punaḥ sataḥ siddhaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1377:939: ityasati vyāpāre pudgalasya darśanādau kathamasau draṣṭā bhavati |
SA20n1377:944: yadi darśanādiṣu prayatna ākasmiko yato darśanādīni |
SA20n1377:945: na tarhi teṣāṃ pudgalaḥ karteti kathamasau draṣṭā bhavati yāvadvijñātā sati vākasmikatve nirapekṣatvāt na kadācitprayatno na syādanityo na syāt |
SA20n1377:946: nitye ca prayatne darśanādīnāṃ yugapacca nityaṃ ca pravṛttiḥ syāditi doṣaḥ |
SA20n1377:951: tasya tathā sthitasya pratyayatvaṃ na yujyate |
SA20n1377:953: sati hi tatpratyayatve na kadācitpudgalo nāstīti |
SA20n1377:954: kimarthaṃ prāk prayatno na syādyadā notpannaḥ |
SA20n1377:956: tṛtīyaśca kaścitpakṣo nāsti yanna sthito na vinaṣṭaḥ syāditi |
SA20n1377:960: ātmopalambhe doṣaśca deśito yata eva ca ||
SA20n1377:961: dharmoddāneṣu hi bhagavatā sarve dharmā anātmāna iti deśitaṃ paramārthaśūnyatāyāmasti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhānpratisaṃdadhāti |
SA20n1377:966: śūnyatāyāmasya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate nādhimucyate |
SA20n1377:969: pudgalo 'pi hi bhagavatā tatra tatra deśitaḥ |
SA20n1377:970: parijñātāvī bhārahāraḥ śraddhānusāryādipudgalavyavasthānata ityasati dravyato 'stitve kasmāddeśitaḥ |
SA20n1377:974: pudgalaprajñaptimantareṇa tadvṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaśca deśayituṃ na śakyaḥ |
SA20n1377:975: tatra parijñāsūtre parijñeyā dharmāḥ saṃkleśaḥ parijñā vyavadānaṃ |
SA20n1377:979: tayorvṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaścāntareṇa parijñātāvibhārahārapudgalaprajñaptiṃ na śakyeta deśayituṃ |
SA20n1377:981: teṣāṃ vṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaścāntareṇa śraddhānusāryādipudgalaprajñaptiṃ na śakyeta deśayituṃ |
SA20n1377:982: yenāsati dravyato 'stitve pudgalo deśita ityayamatra nayo veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1377:992: tathā hi sarveṣāṃ na dṛṣṭasatyānāmātmadarśanaṃ vidyate |
SA20n1377:994: na hi pūrvamātmānamanātmato gṛhītvā satyābhisamayakāle kaścidātmato gṛhṇāti |
SA20n1377:995: yathā duḥkhaṃ duḥkhataḥ pūrvamagṛhītvā paścādgṛhṇātīti yathāpūrvaṃ tathā paścādapi mokṣo na syāt |
SA20n1377:996: sati cātmanyavaśyamahaṃkāramamakārābhyāmātmatṛṣṇayā cānyaiśca tannidānaiḥ kleśairbhavitavyamiti ato 'pi mokṣo na syāt |
SA20n1377:1000: ātmārthaṃ ca na riñcanti parārthaṃ sādhayanti ca ||104 ||
